/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and brown, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
